title: Proto Pitch
description: A dynamic event that blends the creativity of UI/UX design with the competitive spirit of a hackathon. Participants will be tasked with building a functional prototype in Figma based on a theme disclosed at the start of the event. Within a limited timeframe, teams will brainstorm, design, and iterate to create user-friendly and visually appealing prototypes. Once the designs are complete, each team will present their prototype to a panel of judges, explaining their design process, key features, and rationale.
registration: Only college students are permitted to participate.
A valid college ID is mandatory.
Participants must wear the registration throughout the day.
Prior registration is mandatory to attend any event/workshops, either online or on-spot.
Re-entry is not allowed, and the fee paid for any event/workshops is non-refundable.
The team-head should register for the event on behalf of the team.
rules: Participants must bring their own laptops.
Teams must use Figma for designing.
A theme will be disclosed on the day of the event.
Participants will have 90 minutes to complete their design.
Each team will get 3-4 minutes to explain their design to the judges.
Evaluation Criteria: Alignment with the theme, Creativity & Innovation, User Experience, Functionality, Aesthetics, Completion, and Presentation.
All work must be original; plagiarism will lead to disqualification.
Participants who fail to follow the rules or engage in plagiarism will be disqualified.
